RD...name: RD..
RD...description: the global namespace, access it using RD.

RD.SceneNode.name: RD.SceneNode
RD.SceneNode.description: SceneNode class to hold an scene item

RD.Sprite.name: RD.Sprite
RD.Sprite.description: Sprite class , inherits from SceneNode but helps to render 2D planes (in 3D Space)

RD.Billboard.name: RD.Billboard
RD.Billboard.description: Billboard class to hold an scene item, used for camera aligned objects

RD.PointCloud.name: RD.PointCloud
RD.PointCloud.description: PointCloud renders an array of points

RD.ParticlesEmissor.name: RD.ParticlesEmissor
RD.ParticlesEmissor.description: ParticlesEmissor renders points and animate them as particles

RD.Scene.name: RD.Scene
RD.Scene.description: Scene holds the full scene graph, use root to access the root child

RD.Renderer.name: RD.Renderer
RD.Renderer.description: Renderer in charge of rendering a Scene

RD.Camera.name: RD.Camera
RD.Camera.description: Camera wraps all the info about the camera (properties and view and projection matrices)

classitems.description: Main namespace
A unique identifier, useful to retrieve nodes by name
classitems.name: id

classitems.description: the name of the shader in the shaders manager
classitems.name: shader

classitems.description: The position relative to its parent
classitems.name: uniforms

classitems.description: The position relative to its parent in vec3 format
classitems.name: position

classitems.description: The orientation relative to its parent in quaternion format
classitems.name: rotation

classitems.description: The scaling relative to its parent in vec3 format (default is [1,1,1])
classitems.name: scaling

classitems.description: The color in RGBA format
classitems.name: color

classitems.description: This number is the 4ï¿½ component of color but can be accessed directly
classitems.name: opacity

classitems.description: The scene where this node is attached
classitems.name: scene

classitems.description: The parent node where this node is attached
classitems.name: parentNode

classitems.description: Attach node to its children list
classitems.name: addChild

classitems.description: Remove a node from its children list
classitems.name: removeChild

classitems.description: Change the order inside the children, useful when rendering without Depth Test
classitems.name: setChildIndex

classitems.description: Recursively retrieves all children nodes (this doesnt include itself)
classitems.name: getAllChildren

params.name: result
params.description: [Optional] you can specify an array where all the children will be pushed

classitems.description: Recursively retrieves all children nodes taking into account visibility (flags.visible)
classitems.name: getVisibleChildren

params.name: result
params.description: you can specify an array where all the children will be pushed

classitems.description: Returns an object that represents the current state of this object an its children
classitems.name: serialize

classitems.description: Configure this SceneNode to a state from an object (used with serialize)
classitems.name: configure

params.name: o
params.description: object with the state of a SceneNode

classitems.description: sets the name of the mesh to be used to render the object
classitems.name: setMesh

params.name: mesh_name
params.description: also it accepts a mesh itself

classitems.description: Sets the name of the mesh to be used to render the object
classitems.name: setTexture

params.name: channel
params.description: which channel to use (the texture will be uploaded to the shader with the name "u_" + channel + "_texture"

params.name: texture
params.description: texture name (textures are retrieved from the renderer.textures

classitems.description: name of texture to use in the color channel (the same as SetTexture("color", name ))
classitems.name: texture

classitems.description: clears position, rotation and scale
classitems.name: resetTransform

classitems.description: Translate object in local space
classitems.name: translate

classitems.description: Rotate object (supports local or global but doesnt takes into account parent)
classitems.name: rotate

params.name: in_local
params.description: specify if the axis is in local space or global space

classitems.description: Scale object
classitems.name: scale

classitems.description: Set the pivot point, 0,0,0 by default (WARNING: use flags.pivot = true  to enable the use of the pivot)
classitems.name: setPivot

params.name: pivot
params.description: local coordinate of the pivot point

classitems.description: Get transform local matrix
classitems.name: getLocalMatrix

classitems.description: Get transform global matrix (concatenating parents) (its a reference)
classitems.name: getGlobalMatrix

classitems.description: Get global rotation (concatenating parent rotations)
classitems.name: getGlobalRotation

classitems.description: recomputes _local_matrix according to position, rotation and scaling
classitems.name: updateLocalMatrix

classitems.description: recomputes _global_matrix according to position, rotation and scaling
classitems.name: updateGlobalMatrix

params.name: fast
params.description: skips recomputation of parent, use it only if you are sure its already updated

params.name: update_childs
params.description: update global matrix in childs too

classitems.description: recompute local and global matrix
classitems.name: updateMatrices

params.name: fast
params.description: uses the global matrix as it is in the parent node instead of crawling all the ierarchy

classitems.description: updates position, rotation and scale from the matrix
classitems.name: fromMatrix

params.name: is_global
params.description: if the matrix is in global or local space

classitems.description: Returns a point multiplied by the local matrix
classitems.name: getLocalPoint

classitems.description: Returns a point rotated by the local rotation
classitems.name: getLocalVector

classitems.description: Returns the node position in global coordinates
classitems.name: getGlobalPosition

classitems.description: Returns a point multiplied by the global matrix
classitems.name: getGlobalPoint

classitems.description: Returns a point rotated by the global matrix
classitems.name: getGlobalVector

classitems.description: Returns the distance between the center of the node and the position in global coordinates
classitems.name: getDistanceTo

classitems.description: Searchs the node and returns the first child node with the matching id, it is a recursive search so it is slow
classitems.name: findNode

classitems.description: calls a function in child nodes
classitems.name: propagate

classitems.description: clears all nodes inside
classitems.name: clear

classitems.description: returns gets node by id
classitems.name: getNodeById

classitems.description: propagate update method
classitems.name: update

classitems.description: The root node
classitems.name: root

classitems.description: whats the data folder where all data should be fetch
classitems.name: setDataFolder

classitems.description: clear color and depth buffer
classitems.name: clear

classitems.description: renders once scene from one camera
classitems.name: render

params.name: nodes
params.description: [Optional] array with nodes to render, otherwise all nodes will be rendered

classitems.description: Loads one mesh and stores inside the meshes object to be reused in the future, if it is already loaded it skips the loading
classitems.name: loadMesh

classitems.description: Loads one texture and stores inside the textures object to be reused in the future, if it is already loaded it skips the loading
classitems.name: loadTexture

params.name: options
params.description: texture options as in litegl (option.name is used to store it with a different name)

classitems.description: Loads a shaders file in the Atlas file format (check GL.loadFileAtlas in litegl)
classitems.name: loadShaders

params.name: url
params.description: url to text file containing all the shader files

classitems.description: container with all the registered meshes (same as gl.meshes)
classitems.name: meshes

classitems.description: container with all the registered textures (same as gl.textures)
classitems.name: textures

classitems.description: container with all the registered shaders (same as gl.shaders)
classitems.name: shaders

classitems.description: the camera type, RD.Camera.PERSPECTIVE || RD.Camera.ORTHOGRAPHIC
classitems.name: type

classitems.description: near distance
classitems.name: near

classitems.description: far distance
classitems.name: far

classitems.description: aspect (width / height)
classitems.name: aspect

classitems.description: fov angle in degrees
classitems.name: fov

classitems.description: size of frustrum when working in orthographic
classitems.name: frustum_size

classitems.description: Position where the camera eye is located
classitems.name: position

classitems.description: Where the camera is looking at, the center of where is looking
classitems.name: target

classitems.description: Up vector
classitems.name: up

classitems.description: changes the camera to perspective mode
classitems.name: perspective

classitems.description: changes the camera to orthographic mode (frustumsize is top-down)
classitems.name: orthographic

classitems.description: configure view of the camera
classitems.name: lookAt

classitems.description: update view projection matrices
classitems.name: updateMatrices

classitems.description: update camera using a model as reference
classitems.name: updateMatrices

classitems.description: transform vector (only rotates) from local to global
classitems.name: getLocalVector

classitems.description: transform point from local to global
classitems.name: getLocalVector

classitems.description: gets the front vector normalized
classitems.name: getFront

classitems.description: move the position and the target
classitems.name: move

classitems.description: move the position and the target using the local coordinates system of the camera
classitems.name: moveLocal

classitems.description: rotate over its position
classitems.name: rotate

classitems.description: rotate over its position
classitems.name: rotateLocal

classitems.description: rotate around its target position
classitems.name: rotate

params.name: center
params.description: if another center is provided it rotates around it

classitems.description: projects a point from 3D to 2D
classitems.name: project

classitems.description: projects a point from 2D to 3D
classitems.name: unproject

classitems.description: gets the ray passing through one pixel
classitems.name: getRay

classitems.description: given a screen coordinate it cast a ray and returns the collision point with a given plane
classitems.name: getRayPlaneCollision

classitems.description: Used to move the camera (helps during debug)
classitems.name: applyController

classitems.description: test if box is inside frustrum (you must call camera.extractPlanes() previously to update frustrum planes)
classitems.name: testBox

params.name: halfsize
params.description: halfsize of the box (vector from center to corner)

classitems.description: test if sphere is inside frustrum (you must call camera.extractPlanes() previously to update frustrum planes)
classitems.name: testSphere
